name: Find The Gap
description:
The goal is to defeat the opponent in a strategic turn-based fight.

Each round consists of 5 consecutive actions that have to be arranged between the rounds.

An action consists of a mode (attack / defense) and a body part that defines what is attacked / defended.

There are 3 ways to change your sequence of actions:

  1. Change mode (attack -> defense | defense -> attack) (not usable in the first round)
  2. Change in the body part on which the action is carried out (head/chest/belly/legs)
  3. Swap 2 of the actions

You can do 3 of these actions per round. Use right-click to reset them.

In combat, your first action is opposed to your opponent's first action, etc.

Every hit you land increases your opponent's defense. If you manage to block an attack, immediately level up your defense.

Each body part has its own defense level. As soon as a body part has reached level 1, it has a passive chance of parrying an attack on this part even without using a block.

The AI has the same options as the player. So good luck defeating it!
